content: **set of knitted domino jacket in garter st in drops fabel and pants in rib st in drops alpaca for baby and children** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years finished measures chest 52-56-64 68-72 cm / 20½ -22 -25¼ 26¾ -28 3/8 full length 27-29-33 35-38 cm / 10 5/8 -11 3/8 -13 13¾ -15 **materials ** jacket drops fabel from garnstudio 150-150-200 200-250 g color no 910 sea mist drops wooden button no 511 3-4-4 5-5 pcs pants drops alpaca from garnstudio 100-100-150 150-150 g color no 0100 off-white **needles ** jacket drops circular needle 80 cm / 32 size 3 mm / us 2 or 3 or size needed to get 24 sts x 48 row in garter st = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 pants drops double pointed needles and circular needle 40 cm / 16 size 3 mm / us 2 or 3 or size needed to get 24 sts x 32 row in stockinette st = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 **pattern links** french version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b18&d_id=25&lang=fr
